TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GraphicsBindingsBase extends OpenTK.BindingsBase

Docs.summary: Implements BindingsBase for the OpenTK.Graphics namespace (OpenGL and OpenGL|ES).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance native int GetAddress(string funcname) cil managed

Docs.param: A that defines the name of the function.
Docs.summary: Retrieves an unmanaged function pointer to the specified function.
Docs.returns: A that contains the address of funcname or IntPtr.Zero, if the function is not supported by the drivers.
Docs.remarks: Note: some drivers are known to return non-zero values for unsupported functions. Typical values include 1 and 2 - inheritors are advised to check for and ignore these values.
